# inputImage

**Instance Property**

The image to use as an input image.

## Declaration

```swift
var inputImage: CIImage? { get set }
```

## Instance Properties

- **angle**: The angle of the motion, in radians, that determines which direction the blur smears.
- **radius**: The radius of the blur, in pixels.
